Original: You want something? If you're asking
me out to tea, no thanks. I'm waiting
for--Oh, you took my request?
[Page]
Well then... nice meeting you. I'm a
farmer and an explorer. You ever
heard about people like me before?
Translation: You want something? If you're asking
me out to tea, no thanks. I'm waiting
for--Oh, you took my request?
[Page]
Well then... nice meeting you. I'm a
farmer and an explorer. You ever
heard about people like me before?

Original: [Color:5]Do you know of them?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Do you know of them?[Color:0]

Original: Oh, okay. Well, that simplifies things
considerably. You meet another farmer
somewhere or something?
[Page]
If you did, you might have an idea
what I'm asking for. Or maybe not.
Either way, I'll explain it.
Translation: Oh, okay. Well, that simplifies things
considerably. You meet another farmer
somewhere or something?
[Page]
If you did, you might have an idea
what I'm asking for. Or maybe not.
Either way, I'll explain it.

Original: We go exploring in between doing some
farm work. Our special know-how comes
in handy on adventures!
[Page]
But I should explain why I came.
Where do I start...
Translation: We go exploring in between doing some
farm work. Our special know-how comes
in handy on adventures!
[Page]
But I should explain why I came.
Where do I start...

Original: I make my living in livestock, and I
heard there's some top-notch feed
in these parts.
[Page]
Do you know where the Scarlet Pillars
are? Somewhere by a lake northwest in
there are these "Finest Plains."
[Page]
Have you heard of them? I want you
guys to find out where they are.
[Page]
Come talk to me when you do. I'll be
here praying you find success.
Translation: I make my living in livestock, and I
heard there's some top-notch feed
in these parts.
[Page]
Do you know where the Scarlet Pillars
are? Somewhere by a lake northwest in
there are these "Finest Plains."
[Page]
Have you heard of them? I want you
guys to find out where they are.
[Page]
Come talk to me when you do. I'll be
here praying you find success.

Original: Whoa, back already? Don't tell me you
found the Finest Plains so soon?
Translation: Whoa, back already? Don't tell me you
found the Finest Plains so soon?

Original: [Color:5]Have you found them?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Have you found them?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: Well, what's the cotton-picking idea,
then? I don't like being teased.
Translation: Well, what's the cotton-picking idea,
then? I don't like being teased.

Original: Information? It's not much, but...
I heard it's [Color:5]near a lake northwest in
the Scarlet Pillars[Color:0]. That ring a bell?
Translation: Information? It's not much, but...
I heard it's [Color:5]near a lake northwest in
the Scarlet Pillars[Color:0]. That ring a bell?

Original: Huh!? Really!? Golly! I won't be able
to sit still 'til I've seen them for
myself.
[Page]
I'll go and check if you just show
me on the map.
Translation: Huh!? Really!? Golly! I won't be able
to sit still 'til I've seen them for
myself.
[Page]
I'll go and check if you just show
me on the map.

Original: Huh... Well, all right. I'll hurry
there and come straight back with an
[Item:1355]! Just sit tight.
Translation: Huh... Well, all right. I'll hurry
there and come straight back with an
[Item:1355]! Just sit tight.

Original: Hey! The Finest Plains weren't there!
You think you can play me for a rube?
[Page]
I almost got eaten by this awful old
monster! That wouldn'tve been funny!
[Page]
Now listen here. You better find the
Finest Plains and tell me honest
where they are.
[Page]
If you don't... I'll use you folks
as fertilizer! Believe that!
Translation: Hey! The Finest Plains weren't there!
You think you can play me for a rube?
[Page]
I almost got eaten by this awful old
monster! That wouldn'tve been funny!
[Page]
Now listen here. You better find the
Finest Plains and tell me honest
where they are.
[Page]
If you don't... I'll use you folks
as fertilizer! Believe that!

Original: Yes... yes! Momma! Pawpaw! I finally
found the Finest Plains!
[Page]
Oh... whoopsie.
Translation: Yes... yes! Momma! Pawpaw! I finally
found the Finest Plains!
[Page]
Oh... whoopsie.

Original: Hmph, you're better than I thought.
I guess you're not so bad after all.
Honestly... I am grateful, a little.
[Page]
I-I talked to the bar girl already.
So go on and get your reward, got
it!? And... um... thanks.
Translation: Hmph, you're better than I thought.
I guess you're not so bad after all.
Honestly... I am grateful, a little.
[Page]
I-I talked to the bar girl already.
So go on and get your reward, got
it!? And... um... thanks.

Original: Things sure are gonna be hectic round
the farm. The seasons never stop...
I better get a harvest crew together.
Translation: Things sure are gonna be hectic round
the farm. The seasons never stop...
I better get a harvest crew together.
